text: Tales from the Punchbowl is the fourth studio album by Primus. Primus is an American rock band. The album was released on June 6, 1995. It was released again in 1996. The album went to number eight on the Billboard 200, an American music chart. It is the band's last studio album to get an RIAA certification. It is certified gold by the RIAA. == Track listing == == References == Category:1995 albums Category:Interscope Records albums
title: Tales from the Punchbowl
